default.$description: Subtle border color for default theme in app context. More visible than neutral.200 but still minimal. Less prominent than accessibility theme.

small.$description: Smaller than default. Minimal theme keeps this subtle for compact layouts.

default.$description: Baseline for minimal theme. All standard components use this value for consistent, stackable design.

large.$description: In minimal theme, same as default for consistency. Still stackable, no visual hierarchy needed.

extra-large.$description: Slightly more than default even in minimal theme, for modals and prominent containers.
